ABOUTME.ABOUT1: My ability to combine creativity with logical thinking enables me to turn innovative ideas into high-quality web projects. As an aspiring junior web developer, I am looking for exciting challenges.
ABOUTME.ABOUT2: If you think I could be a good fit for your projects, I look forward to hearing from you!

PORTFOLIO.DESCRIPTION: Discover my latest development projects. Try out the projects and explore the code to see my frontend skills in action.

PROJECT1.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories. Developed in a team with Git version management.

PROJECT2.DESCRIPTION: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

PROJECT3.DESCRIPTION: Based on the PokeAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

CONTACT.PRIVACY3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

FOOTER.SUB: Want to discuss a new project?
FOOTER.TXT: Say hello! let's discuss your ideas and make it happen
